title: Olay Definity Deep Penetrating Foaming Moisturizer, Packaging May Vary, 1.7 Ounce
description: Inspired by high definition technology; new Olay Definity Deep Penetrating Foaming Moisturizer helps reverse the appearance of past damage coming from beneath the skin’s surface. Its unique aerated serum foam actively combats the look of skin discolorations to revitalize luminosity. Glucosamine Complex hydrates to allow the natural rebuilding of collagen; diminishing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly for a smooth; weightless feel. Active foaming action feels rich and luxurious as it penetrates to condition skin at the source of past damage. Over 8 weeks; the appearance of dullness; brown spots and uneven skin tone diminish.

title: 24k Gold Intensive Eye Treatment Cream
description: 24K Intensive Eye Formula Cream brings out your inner youth by deflating puffiness and reducing the appearance of around the eyes, giving your eyes a more rested look.

title: OGX 30 Day Smoothing Treatment, Ever Straight Brazilian Keratin Therapy, 3.3oz
description: An exclusive, high potency keratin complex which reduces up to 95% of curl and eliminates frizz by penetrating the cuticle with keratin proteins. Results may vary depending on texture of hair. No formaldehyde added.
